m_DescList: Text often contains spaces, therefore we use <color=#3173FF>\s</color> to represent spaces.
The boss is inspecting! All colleagues not at their workstations will be in trouble!
Use "X" to indicate an occupied workstation and " " for unoccupied.
| |X|X| indicates: first workstation empty, second and third occupied.
Now the boss wants you to count absent colleagues and deduct their bonuses harshly.
For 100% of input data, follow these rules:
2. Between adjacent "|" symbols, there must be either " " or "X"
When a match is selected, spaces within the match will be represented by <color=#e06600>□</color>.
Construct a regex to pass all test cases.
